author: customer
text: I was so excited about my LV purchase. I went with the more expensive version of the bag that I wanted because the description said it was in ‘excellent’, ‘superb’ condition. No visible problems. After receiving the bag, I was only able to carry it for less than one week when the strap broke off from the buckle attached to the purse. There is no way to carry the bag now. Upon further inspection, I see that the strap on the other side is also about to rip. It is an obvious problem that should have been noted and reported on their site to potential buyers. Now I am out a LOT of money and having to wait weeks or months for LV to fix the problem at who knows what the cost will be to make this a usable bag again. So disappointed.
title: I was so excited about my LV purchase

author: customer
text: I ordered a pair of Tory Burch sunglasses whose condition was stated as "very good." The description only mentioned a slight scratch on the lens. I got the glasses and was so disappointed. The scratch isn't even that noticeable, it is the fact that they were so grimy, dirty, and the company didn't even attempt to clean them up. In addition to that, one arm of the glasses is completely bent, and the Tory Burch logo is supposed to line up perfectly, but since it is bent, it looks distorted. This was my first purchase from the The RealReal and now I know to stay away. If I had this kind of a problem with a pair of sunglasses, who knows what I would run into if I was buying a luxury designer purse.
title: I ordered a pair of Tory Burch…

author: Sevcoop
text: My issue is with the shipping costs.  My item, a small phone case/wallet, weighed 7.8 ounces, yet it cost me $12.95 for shipping.  The item itself cost $17.50.  As the item did not fit my phone - my mistake totally -  I returned it.  The RealReal wanted me to pay $11.95 for prepaid shipping, which would then result in the shipping costs being higher than the actual item itself.  Instead, I mailed it myself for $5.40.  While I knew the initial cost to ship it TO me, I was unaware of the cost associated with its return.  All in all, a very unsatisfactory transaction.
title: Shipping Costs
